headline: Schlumberger Limited (SLB)’s Having A Hard Time, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks On Jim Cramer’s Mind As He Discussed A “Weird Number”. Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is one of the biggest oil and gas equipment providers in the world. Its shares have lost 8% year-to-date as they have yet to recover […]

headline: ZEDEDA Strengthens Leadership Team and Secures Major Enterprise Wins as Edge AI Goes Mainstream
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., July 30, 2025--ZEDEDA, the leader in edge orchestration, today announced significant growth and expansion in the first half of 2025, driven by the accelerating global adoption of edge computing. The company expanded its executive leadership team, secured major enterprise deployments, opened a new Middle East headquarters backed by strategic investors, and published industry-leading research demonstrating edge AI's rapid evolution from experimental to mission-critical infrastruc
